name: Perimeter of an equilateral triangle
instruction:
Given side of an equilateral triangle. Find its perimeter.

Set the variable `side` and assign it a value of any non-negative number (side of an equilateral triangle).
Set the variable `perimeter`, in which you calculate the perimeter of the triangle (the perimeter of a triangle is equal to the side multiplied by 3).

Here is an example that is fundamentally similar to what needs to be done,
but adapt it to the requirements of the task:
```javascript
const a = 10;
const p = a * 3;
```
